title: Cute bear icon on OCE
body: Is there any reason there is no cute bear icon for sale on OCE because it was on sale on the other servers I tried like Russia and Turkey

replies.body: I have been checking the OCE store like every day my OCD can not take eet anymore

um

so you want every account you own on every region to have this bear?

If that's so, why does EUW not apparently matter?
That reminded me way too much of [this](http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/a-cat-is-fine-too).
but yes yes I wish OCE too
Say, have you tried posting this on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)?
I just suggest that because I do think there's more red activity there.

I'm pretty sure you could get that icon on OCE at some point? Do you mean that it's not on sale anymore?

Just because a level 3 player has it doesn't mean they got it recently. It could just be that they haven't played a game for a while.
I literally bought it on Russia and Turkey yesterday and it is still on sale on EUW

But not OCE?

Well, I'm not the sales co-ordinator for Riot or anything, so I don't know why they'd be having region-exclusive sales of a certain avatar of a bear. Maybe it's just related to the Valentine's themed Annie skin?
well bed I hope it comes back because pretty
